section.p: When you fit the key into the hole, it is sucked in with a hiss, and disappears. Cross the off your Adventure Sheet.

The stone slab retracts upward with a rumble. The chamber beyond is still crawling with stag beetles but the walls have lost their yellow glow. Any equipment that you had to leave here the last time is still there. You can reclaim your gear. Simply transfer all the stuff you want from below to your Adventure Sheet. [Through the magic of computers, all the items you left at 586 are now at this section --Ed]
When you are ready to leave, the slab slams down again, and with the pyramid key gone, seals the chamber once and for all. .
